thread.title: Pharmaceutical Sector Due Diligence Report – Opportunities Await
thread.title_full: Pharmaceutical Sector Due Diligence Report – Opportunities Await - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: Pharmaceutical Sector Due Diligence Report – Opportunities Await
text:
NEW YORK, NY / ACCESSWIRE / October 7, 2015 / Geron Corporation ( GERN ), Idera Pharmaceuticals Inc. ( IDRA ), Sequenom Inc. ( SQNM ) and Mast Therapeutics Inc. ( MSTX ) are four tickers in the pharmaceutical space with upcoming catalysts that could prove to be profitable for investors. The sector faced recent pressure caused by price gouging and reactions from politicians against 'big pharma' monopolies. However, the pharmaceutical sector is comprised of independently moving stocks that move based on news and clinical data releases. This therefore has presented investors with investment opportunities due to the unwarranted decline in the overall sector. Many stocks have already bounced back, others are awaiting their turn.
For a more detailed research report with analyst comments and recommendation on the Pharmaceutical Sector please follow the link. There is no cost obligation required to view analyst brief.
http://bit.ly/-Pharma_Sector_Report
